name: Dodge Dancer
description:
Overview


Enjoy some sweet chiptunes while you dodge frantically about a 3x3 grid. Get a perfect score, and unlock added difficulty modifiers for an extra challenge. Keep Dodge Dude from getting hit 10 times, and he'll smile because you're good at the game.

  • 8 songs
  • 5 difficulty modifiers
  • Challenging tracks
  • A whole lot of fun

Get in there and see that smiling pixel man face.
